about_the_game:
Steel Tower Swordmaster is a combat-focused sword-fighting Action RPG. This demo allows you to explore the first section of the game - the Exile Village.

Populated with bandits, thieves and murderers, the Exile Village will test your courage and mettle. You must approach each encounter with caution lest your journey end prematurely. 

Will you survive and continue your trial? Or perish on the cold concrete floors of the Exile Village?

Features

  • A sample of weapons that will appear in the full game - to be used by or against you.

  • Unique characters that react to your behaviours and actions.

  • Stat allocation and character customisation - Choose between making your sword pilgrim strong, fast, tough or skilful.

  • Encounters that will test your tactical skill and intuition.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence and depictions of death not suitable for all audiences.
